description.value: You've trained with the weapons of the Bright Lions. You gain access to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Lion Scythe]{Lion Scythes} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Sun Sling]{Sun Slings}. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank with lion scythes and sun slings.
